title: Floatline Garden
description: A digital garden interface for cultivating and connecting thoughts, ideas, and knowledge fragments in a non-linear, organic way.

fullDescription.content: Floatline Garden is a digital garden interface for cultivating and connecting thoughts, ideas, and knowledge fragments in a non-linear, organic way. It provides a space where ideas can grow, connect, and evolve naturally, mimicking the organic growth patterns of a real garden.

Unlike traditional note-taking or knowledge management systems that emphasize hierarchy and organization, digital gardens embrace messiness, evolution, and interconnection. Floatline Garden implements this philosophy with a focus on:

items.title: Seedlings
items.content: Capture raw thoughts and ideas without worrying about structure

items.title: Growth
items.content: Revisit and expand ideas over time as your understanding develops

items.title: Cross-Pollination
items.content: Create connections between seemingly unrelated concepts

items.title: Seasons
items.content: Track how your thinking evolves over time with temporal markers

fullDescription.content: Floatline Garden incorporates principles from the FLOAT (Floating Linked Ontological Associative Thinking) methodology, creating a hybrid system that balances structure and chaos, organization and exploration.

screenshots.alt: Floatline Garden interface showing the digital garden with interconnected notes and ideas
